tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Magi Conversing about Heavenly Bodies, after Perino del Vaga", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and dark brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on off white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-531.
